title: Advantage of majoring in computer science

content.description:
School conversation

Selection plays one time.
content.question: According to the male speaker, what is one advantage of the field he has chosen for his major in college?

choices.label: It makes finding a job relatively easy.
It is offered by almost every college.
It is the subject in which he is most interested.
It provides opportunities to work in the arts.

content.answer: It makes finding a job relatively easy.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
